Test.Name: MetadataRecording is supported
Test.Description: DynamicRecordings="false" DynamicTracks="false" Encoding not present

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetServices: SUPPORTED RecordingControl: SUPPORTED, DynamicRecordings: NOT SUPPORTED DynamicTracks: NOT SUPPORTED AudioRecording: NOT SUPPORTED MetadataRecording: SUPPORTED Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: MetadataRecording is not supported
Test.Description: DynamicRecordings="false" DynamicTracks="false" Encoding not present

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetServices: SUPPORTED RecordingControl: SUPPORTED, DynamicRecordings: NOT SUPPORTED DynamicTracks: NOT SUPPORTED AudioRecording: NOT SUPPORTED MetadataRecording: SUPPORTED Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Incorrect response:created recording is not returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: DUT did not return Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording creation

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 11 - Check that recording list contains new recording after refresh Recording list doesn't contain new recording STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect response: deleted recording is returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The DUT returned Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording deletion

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 16 - Check that recording list doesn't contain recording deleted Recording wasn't deleted STEP FAILED

Test.Name: SourceId parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The SourceId parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 16 - Check that recording list doesn't contain recording deleted Recording wasn't deleted STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Name parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Name parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 12 - Check that configuration parameters of new recording are valid Source Name is 'CameraName1' but must be 'CameraName' STEP FAILED

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 12 - Check that configuration parameters of new recording are valid Source Location is 'LocationDescription1' but must be 'LocationDescription' STEP FAILED

Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Address parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Content parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Content parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Not unique Recording token

Test.Name: Correct response: some encodings of Video type and of Audio type
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: no audio encoding, no Audio track
Test.Description: DUT sends encoding list without encoding of Audio type DUT sends created recording without Audio track

Test.Name: Correct response: no audio encoding, Audio track is present
Test.Description: DUT sends encoding list without encoding of Audio type DUT sends created recording with Audio track

Test.Name: Correct response: no video encoding, video track is present
Test.Description: DUT sends encoding list without encoding of Video type DUT sends created recording with Video track

Test.Name: Correct response: no video encoding, no video track
Test.Description: DUT sends encoding list without encoding of Video type DUT sends created recording without Video track

Test.Name: Correct response: MetadataRecording not supported, no Metadata track
Test.Description:
!!! refresh features with Test ID = "Features.02"!!!
DUT sends created recording without Metadata track

Test.Name: Correct response: MetadataRecording not supported, Metadata track is present
Test.Description:
!!! refresh features with Test ID = "Features.02"!!!
DUT sends created recording with Metadata track

Test.Name: MetadataRecording is supported, no Metadata track
Test.Description:
!!! refresh features with Test ID = "Features.01"!!!
DUT sends created recording without Metadata track

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 12 - Check that configuration parameters of new recording are valid There are no tracks of type: 'Metadata'. STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Correct response - some Metadata tracks
Test.Description: !!! refresh features with Test ID = "Features.02"!!! DUT sends created recording wit 2 Metadata tracks

Test.Name: Correct response - some Video and Audio tracks
Test.Description: DUT sends GetSericeCapabilities with MetadataRecording="true" DUT sends encoding list with Video and Audio types DUT sends created recording wit 2 Video tracks, 2 Audio tracks and 2 Metadata tracks
